question: I am worried about something...?
question_content: I have been noticing a lot of bruises on my legs. I have been bleeding easily, too. Should I be worried?

answers.answer_content: in my sisters keeper there was a little girl and she had bruises on her back and she bled and she got lukemia...i dont know but thats what i thought when i read this contact a doctor and i wish you the best of luck
